Web Developer

My name is Peter Krumb, and I am excited to help you build and maintain your next amazing website, app, or project. As a recent graduate of Northwestern University's full-stack Web Developer bootcamp, I come equipped with knowledge of both front- and back-end frameworks such as React, Node, and MongoDB, as well as an excitement to further my learning and build amazing projects that satisfy both client and myself. Don't hesitate to reach out with any questions, comments or concerns. Thank you for reading!
